# Changelog

## 2.160.0
- Add system event handling and device info logging in AutoConnect. Introduced system event callbacks to track device-related events such as

for improved AutoConnect handling. Enhanced device info logging and saving mechanisms by integrating new fields such as VendorID, Port, and SerialNumber. Improved concurrency handling to prevent conflicting AutoConnect instances.

Updated on April 21, 2025
